titleStmt.title: Jus Cæsaris et ecclesiæ vere dictæ or, A treatise wherein independency, presbytery, the power of kings, and of the church, or of the brethren in ecclesiastical concerns, government and discipline of the church : and wherein also the use of liturgies, tolleration, connivence, conventicles or private assemblies, excomminication, election of popes, bishops, priests what and whom are meant by the term church, 18 Matthew are discoursed : and how I Cor. 14. 32. generally misunderstand is rightly expounded : wherein also the popes power over princes, and the liberty of the press, are discoursed / by William Denton ...
titleStmt.author: Denton, William, 1605-1691.

publicationStmt.publisher: And are to be sold by John Kersey and Henry Faythorn ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
"An apology for the liberty of the press" begins new paging.
